text: hello this is chef john from food wishes

fries

happening don't just stand there and
watch your duck fat take some potatoes
pretty much anything works I'm using
russet here if you use red potatoes they
just don't get quite as crusty because
they have a little more of a waxy

in chunks about that size alright rinse
them drain them and those are going to

okay so my potatoes are prepped back to

generously

put the lid back on steam them until

I'm going to prep some

that's cooking so no problem you just
